title: of the Industrial and Provident Society Act 1893 ((56 & 57 Vict.) c. 39) (as
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Industrial and Provident Societies
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Industrial and Provident Societies 

(Forms) Regulations 2025.

heading: In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2018” means the Industrial and
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2018” means the Industrial and 

Provident Societies (Forms) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 363 of 2018).

text_raw:

Oifigiúil”.

title: of the Industrial and Provident Society Act 1893 ((56 & 57 Vict.) c. 39) (as
heading: 8. The form (Form AH) set out in Part 4 of the Schedule is substituted for
text_raw:
8. The form (Form AH) set out in Part 4 of the Schedule is substituted for 

the form (Form AH) annexed to the Regulations of 2018. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Regulation 5

title: of the Industrial and Provident Society Act 1893 ((56 & 57 Vict.) c. 39) (as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to prescribe amended forms for the 
purposes of the Industrial and Provident Societies Act 1893. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [331] 13
